<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>10494/103536</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101430</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Obesity is Socially Contagious</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Korpulenz ist sozial ansteckend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'obésité est socialement contagieuse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O obesity é social contagious</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'obesità è socialmente contagiosa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η παχυσαρκία είναι κοινωνικά μεταδοτική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La obesidad es social contagiosa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Are your friends making you fat? Or keeping you slender? According to new research from Harvard and the University of California, San Diego, the short answer on both counts is "yes.�</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden Ihre Freunde Sie Fett? Oder Sie 
schlank halten? Entsprechend neuer Forschung von Harvard und von
der Universität von Kalifornien, ist San Diego, die kurze Antwort auf
beiden Zählimpulsen "ja?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vos amis vous font-ils la graisse ? Ou vous 
maintenant mince ? Selon la nouvelle recherche de Harvard et de 
l'université de la Californie, San Diego, la réponse courte sur les 
deux comptes est "oui ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seus amigos estão fazendo-lhe a gordura? Ou
mantendo o delgado? De acordo com a pesquisa nova de Harvard e 
da universidade de Califórnia, o San Diego, a resposta curta sobre 
ambas as contagens é "sim?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I vostri amici stanno rendendovi il grasso? 
O mantenendoli snelli? Secondo nuova ricerca da Harvard e 
dall'università di California, San Diego, la risposta corta su 
entrambi i conteggi è "sì?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι φίλοι σας σας κάνουν το λίπος; Ή κρατώντας 
σας λεπτούς; Σύμφωνα με τη νέα έρευνα από το Χάρβαρντ και 
το πανεπιστήμιο Καλιφόρνιας, Σαν Ντιέγκο, η σύντομη απάντηση και 
στις δύο αριθμήσεις είναι "ναι;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Sus amigos le están haciendo la grasa? ¿O 
manteniéndole delgado? ¿Según la nueva investigación de 
Harvard y de la universidad de California, San Diego, la respuesta 
corta sobre ambas cuentas está "sí?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

              <value>author</value>
            </role>

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
